scripts.list-md-files: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dir='./src/database/md';const out=path.join(dir,'fileNames.txt');fs.readdir(dir,(err,files)=>{if(err)throw err;fs.writeFile(out,files.join('\n'),'utf8',(writeErr)=>{if(writeErr)throw writeErr;console.log('已生成: '+out)});})"
